snippet: Former Hampshire captain and cricket commentator Mark Nicholas has been taken to hospital for a second time in three days after falling ill during the second test between Australia and Pakistan on Wednesday....
lead_paragraph: Former Hampshire captain and cricket commentator Mark Nicholas has been taken to hospital for a second time in three days after falling ill during the second test between Australia and Pakistan on Wednesday.

headline.main: Cricket Commentator Nicholas Taken to Hospital Again
headline.print_headline: Cricket Commentator Nicholas Taken to Hospital Again
